services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building and optimizing websites using HTML, CSS, React, and Next.js to create responsive and engaging user experiences.

services.title: API Integration & Collaboration
services.description: Experienced in collaborating with backend developers to process and integrate APIs, ensuring efficient data retrieval and display on the frontend.

services.title: UI/UX Implementation
services.description: Implementing UI/UX designs based on accessibility principles to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Enhancing website performance through techniques like lazy loading, code splitting, and caching, ensuring fast and efficient web applications.

services.title: State Management
services.description: Utilizing React Context, Redux, or Zustand to manage application state efficiently, ensuring data consistency across components.

aboutpara: I specialize in Front-End Development with expertise in React.js, Next.js, responsive web design, API implementation, and SEO optimization. My experience as a freelancer has equipped me with the skills to manage and develop high-quality web solutions. Further details about my qualifications are available in the attached CV, and I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your company.
